name: Liao, David
titles:
Leading the quality team for GMP compliance
Lead
resume_snippet: Curriculum Vitae | David Liao  Last Updated: Sep/2023    20 + years across the Pharmaceutical Industry with exposure on Sterile API, Non-Sterile API, Oral Solid Dosage & Sterile Injectables, Chinese traditional medicines, herbal extracts. Performed 240+ third party GMP audits as leader auditor covering Sterile API, Non-Sterile APIs, Sterile Finished Dosage Forms in China, followed up for CAPA and closure of the audit.  Have good understanding and be knowledgeable on EU GMP, CFR Part 211, China G
